Key Match Events: Draymond Green airmailed an inbounds pass to Andrew Wiggins, then inexplicably fouled Eason on a drive, sending Houston's live-wire forward to the free throw line to tie the game and sending himself to the bench for good with a disqualifying sixth foul.
Houston missed their first five shots in overtime, falling behind multiple possessions.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Kerr said, 'I was so proud of the guys for the way they responded to what was an onslaught from Houston that second half, and especially fourth quarter.'
Kerr added, 'Great experience. To win after Draymond fouls out, to win without Steph, to win on a night when a game just completely flipped.'
